CustomField.formula: IF(Status__c = "Voided", "", IF(Status__c = "Declined", "", IF(Status__c = "Sent", "", TEXT(ROUND((Completed__c - Sent__c) - MOD(Completed__c - Sent__c, 1), 0)) &" day(s), "& TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Completed__c - Sent__c, 1) * 24 - MOD(MOD(Completed__c - Sent__c,1) * 24, 1), 0)) &" hour(s), "& TEXT(ROUND(MOD(MOD(Completed__c - Sent__c, 1) * 24, 1) * 60, 0)) &" minute(s)")))
CustomField.label: Time to Complete
